channel.title: Service Discovery on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Service Discovery on My New Hugo Site

item.title: survey of service discovery in MSA
item.description: Service Discovery 의 개념 설명 https://dzone.com/articles/service-discovery-in-a-microservices-architecture http://microservices.io/patterns/client-side-discovery.html http://www.mammatustech.com/Microservice-Service-Discovery-with-Consul 주요 프로젝트 Jason Wilder’s blog 에서 여러가지를 간단하게 정리 해 놓았다. https://github.com/Netflix/eureka https://www.consul.io/ https://github.com/coreos/etcd NginX https://www.nginx.com/blog/service-discovery-in-a-microservices-architecture/ https://www.nginx.com/blog/service-discovery-nginx-plus-zookeeper/ zookeeper http://blog.arungupta.me/zookeeper-microservice-registration-discovery/ https://tech.knewton.com/blog/2014/12/eureka-shouldnt-use-zookeeper-service-discovery/ https://github.com/coreos/etcd
